definition: to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from
to go and return/to return/to resume/to return to a normal or original state/to repeat/again/to recover/to restore/to turn over/to reply/to answer/to reply to a letter/to retaliate/to carry out

sentences.english: In addition, nearly half of the respondents said they were worried about acts of revenge by the perpetrators.
sentences.chinese: 此外，將近一半的受訪者稱擔心被打擊報復。

sentences.english: Last week Aushebarb warned it would strike the country in retaliation.
sentences.chinese: 因此，上週青年黨曾威脅要對該國進行打擊報復。

sentences.english: No one may suppress such complaints, charges and exposures or retaliate against the citizens making them.
sentences.chinese: 任何人不得壓制和打擊報復。
